    • containsText

      public Boolean containsText(String text)
      Check if the song contains a specific text in its metadata or lyrics.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to search for.
      Returns:
      True if the text is found in the metadata or lyrics, false otherwise.

    • refreshLyrics

      public void refreshLyrics() throws SettingsFilesException
      Refresh the lyrics for this song. This will load the lyrics from the file system.
      Throws:
      SettingsFilesException
